aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: At Biyaa, we believe in the power of connection and the beauty of lifelong partnerships. Our journey began with a simple but profound vision: to create a trusted and secure platform where individuals can find their ideal life partners based on shared values, aspirations, and cultural understanding.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower individuals to find compatible life partners by providing a secure, user-friendly, and culturally sensitive platform that fosters genuine connections and successful marriages.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading matrimonial platform globally, recognized for our integrity, innovation, and commitment to the happiness of every couple we help unite.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Integrity, Empathy, Innovation, Community, and Trust. These values guide every decision we make and every feature we build.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: From a humble beginning to a thriving community, our story is one of dedication, growth, and countless success stories.
journey.beginningText1: Established in [Year], Biyaa started as a small initiative to bridge the gap for individuals seeking meaningful relationships within cultural contexts. We understood the nuances of traditional matchmaking and combined it with modern technology to provide a seamless experience.
journey.beginningText2: Over the years, we have grown into a vibrant community, continuously evolving to meet the diverse needs of our members. Our success is measured by the happiness of the couples who found each other through Biyaa.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Continuously enhancing our platform with cutting-edge technology to provide the best user experience.

community.title: Community-Centric
community.description: Building a supportive and engaging community where members feel safe and valued.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Connecting hearts across borders, making it easier to find partners worldwide.

trust.title: Trust & Security
trust.description: Prioritizing the safety and privacy of our members through robust security measures.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChoose.subtitle: Discover why Biyaa is the preferred choice for finding your life partner.
whyChoose.privacyDescription: Your data is safe with us. We employ advanced security protocols to keep your personal information confidential.
whyChoose.verifiedDescription: Every profile on Biyaa undergoes a rigorous verification process, ensuring you connect with genuine individuals.
whyChoose.smartMatchingDescription: Our intelligent algorithms analyze your preferences to suggest the most compatible matches, saving you time and effort.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heroMessage: Have questions about finding your perfect match? Need technical support? We're here to help you every step of the way!
contact.multipleWaysDesc: Choose the method that works best for you. We're committed to responding promptly.
contact.generalInquiriesDesc: Questions about our platform, membership, or how we work?
contact.customerSupportDesc: Need help with your account, profile, or matching process?
contact.technicalIssuesDesc: Experiencing technical problems or found a bug?
contact.visitOfficeDesc: We'd love to meet you in person! Drop by our office during business hours.
contact.holidayNote: During Ramadan and major holidays, our office hours may vary. Please call ahead to confirm.
contact.faqDesc: Quick answers to common questions. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us!
contact.responseTime: How quickly do you respond to inquiries?
contact.responseTimeAnswer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent technical issues, we typically respond within 2-4 hours.
contact.messageInfo: What information should I include in my message?
contact.messageInfoAnswer: Please include your full name, registered email (if applicable), and a detailed description of your question or issue. Screenshots are helpful for technical problems.
contact.phoneSupportAnswer: Yes! You can call us during office hours for immediate assistance. For complex issues, we may schedule a callback at your convenience.

form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
form.thankYou: Thank you for contacting us. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

home.heroTitle: Start a New Chapter of Your Life Today
home.heroDescription: No more hassles in finding your bride. Now find your preferred bride in your own district.

statistics.title: Platform Statistics
statistics.description: Join thousands of people who have found their life partners through our platform

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Follow these simple steps to find your perfect life partner

step1.title: Create Biodata
step1.description: Sign up and create your detailed biodata with personal information, preferences, and photos

step2.title: Search Biodata
step2.description: Browse through profiles using advanced filters like location, profession, education, and more

step3.title: Contact
step3.description: Connect with potential matches, share contact information, and start meaningful conversations

step4.title: Get Married
step4.description: Meet your perfect match, get to know each other, and take the next step towards a happy marriage

footer.companyDescription: Biyaa is Bangladesh's leading matrimonial platform, connecting hearts and building families. We help people find their perfect life partners through our trusted and secure platform.

qna.title: Frequently Asked Questions
qna.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Biyaa. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team!
qna.noResultsMessage: Try searching with different keywords or browse all questions below.
qna.supportMessage: Our friendly customer support team is here to help you 24/7
qna.liveChatDescription: Chat with our support team instantly
qna.emailSupportDescription: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours

questions.howToCreateAccount: How do I create an account on Biyaa?
questions.howToCreateAccountAnswer: Creating an account is simple! Click on 'Sign Up' button, provide your email address, create a secure password, and verify your email. Then, complete your profile with personal information, photos, and preferences to start finding matches.
questions.isFreeToJoin: Is it free to join Biyaa?
questions.isFreeToJoinAnswer: Yes, joining Biyaa is completely free! You can create your profile, browse through other profiles, and use basic search features at no cost. We also offer premium features for enhanced matching and communication options.
questions.howToCompleteBiodata: How do I complete my biodata?
questions.howToCompleteBiodataAnswer: After signing up, go to your dashboard and click 'Edit Biodata'. Fill in all sections including personal details, family information, education, profession, and preferences. Upload clear photos and provide honest information for better matches.
questions.whatInfoToInclude: What information should I include in my profile?
questions.whatInfoToIncludeAnswer: Include accurate personal details, education background, profession, family information, lifestyle preferences, and what you're looking for in a partner. Add clear, recent photos and write a brief introduction about yourself.
questions.howToEnsureSafety: How does Biyaa ensure the safety of its users?
questions.howToEnsureSafetyAnswer: We prioritize user safety through profile verification, secure messaging systems, privacy controls, and 24/7 monitoring. All profiles are manually reviewed, and we have strict policies against fake profiles and inappropriate behavior.
questions.canControlWhoSees: Can I control who sees my profile?
questions.canControlWhoSeesAnswer: Yes! You have complete control over your privacy settings. You can choose who can view your profile, photos, and contact information. You can also block or report users if needed.
questions.howProfilesVerifiedAnswer: We verify profiles through multiple methods including email verification, phone number verification, and document verification for premium members. Our team manually reviews all profiles before they go live.
questions.whatToDoSuspiciousProfile: What should I do if I encounter a suspicious profile?
questions.whatToDoSuspiciousProfileAnswer: If you find a suspicious or fake profile, please report it immediately using the 'Report' button on their profile. Our team will investigate and take appropriate action within 24 hours.
questions.howMatchingAlgorithmWorks: How does the matching algorithm work?
questions.howMatchingAlgorithmWorksAnswer: Our smart matching algorithm considers your preferences including age, education, profession, location, family background, and lifestyle choices to suggest the most compatible profiles. The more detailed your profile, the better the matches.
questions.canSearchSpecificCriteria: Can I search for specific criteria?
questions.canSearchSpecificCriteriaAnswer: Yes! Use our advanced search filters to find profiles based on age, location, education, profession, religion, caste, height, and other preferences. You can save your search criteria for future use.
questions.howOftenNewMatches: How often are new matches suggested?
questions.howOftenNewMatchesAnswer: New matches are suggested daily based on your preferences and activity. Premium members receive priority matching and more suggestions. You can also manually browse through profiles anytime.
questions.whatIfNoSuitableMatches: What if I don't find suitable matches?
questions.whatIfNoSuitableMatchesAnswer: Try expanding your search criteria, update your preferences, or improve your profile with more information and photos. Our customer support team can also help optimize your profile for better matches.
questions.howToContactInterested: How can I contact someone I'm interested in?
questions.howToContactInterestedAnswer: You can express interest by sending a 'Like' or direct message through our secure messaging system. Both parties need to show mutual interest to start a conversation.
questions.isMessagingFreeAnswer: Basic messaging features are free for all users. Premium members get additional features like priority messaging, message read receipts, and the ability to see who viewed their profile.
questions.canShareContactInfo: Can I share my contact information?
questions.canShareContactInfoAnswer: For safety reasons, we recommend using our platform's messaging system initially. You can choose to share personal contact information once you feel comfortable and trust the person.
questions.whatToIncludeFirstMessage: What should I include in my first message?
questions.whatToIncludeFirstMessageAnswer: Keep it genuine and respectful. Mention something from their profile that interested you, introduce yourself briefly, and ask a thoughtful question. Avoid generic messages and be authentic.
questions.howToUpdateProfile: How do I update my profile information?
questions.howToUpdateProfileAnswer: Go to your dashboard, click on 'Edit Biodata' or 'Profile Settings', make your changes, and save. Profile updates are reviewed and approved within 24 hours.
questions.canTemporarilyHideProfile: Can I temporarily hide my profile?
questions.canTemporarilyHideProfileAnswer: Yes, you can temporarily deactivate your profile from the settings menu. Your profile will be hidden from searches, but your account and data will remain safe.
questions.howToDeleteAccount: How do I delete my account permanently?
questions.howToDeleteAccountAnswer: Go to Account Settings and select 'Delete Account'. This action is permanent and will remove all your data. Consider deactivating temporarily if you're unsure.
questions.forgotPassword: What should I do if I forgot my password?
questions.forgotPasswordAnswer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your email address, and we'll send you a password reset link. Follow the instructions in the email to create a new password.
questions.mobileAppAvailable: Is Biyaa available as a mobile app?
questions.mobileAppAvailableAnswer: Currently, Biyaa is available as a responsive web application that works perfectly on mobile browsers. We're working on dedicated mobile apps for Android and iOS, coming soon!
questions.foundLifePartner: What happens when I find my life partner?
questions.foundLifePartnerAnswer: Congratulations! Please let us know about your success story. You can deactivate your profile and optionally share your story to inspire other members. We'd love to celebrate your happiness!
questions.contactCustomerSupport: How can I contact customer support?
questions.contactCustomerSupportAnswer: You can reach our customer support team through the 'Contact Us' page, email us at support@biyaa.com, or call our helpline. We're available 24/7 to help with any questions or issues.
questions.matchmakingServices: Do you offer any matchmaking services?
questions.matchmakingServicesAnswer: While our platform is primarily self-service, we offer personalized matchmaking assistance for premium members. Our relationship experts can help optimize your profile and suggest potential matches.
questions.refundPremiumFeatures: Can I get a refund for premium features?
questions.refundPremiumFeaturesAnswer: We offer a satisfaction guarantee for premium memberships. If you're not satisfied within the first 30 days, contact our support team for a full refund.

hero.title: Matrimony Guide
hero.description: Your complete guide to finding your perfect life partner through our platform. Learn how to create an outstanding profile, connect with matches, and navigate your journey to a successful marriage.

step1.title: Step 1: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Start by creating a comprehensive and authentic profile that represents who you are.
bulletPoints: Sign up with your email address and create a secure password
Fill in your personal information including age, height, and occupation
Upload clear, recent photos that show your personality
Write a genuine bio that highlights your interests and values
Specify your preferences for a life partner

step2.title: Step 2: Browse and Search
step2.description: Use our powerful search and matching features to find compatible profiles.
bulletPoints: Use filters to narrow down matches by age, location, education, and profession
Review daily match recommendations based on your preferences
Add interesting profiles to your favorites list
Read compatibility reports to understand match quality

step3.title: Step 3: Connect and Communicate
step3.description: Take the next step by reaching out to potential matches.
bulletPoints: Send interest to profiles you find appealing
Start conversations with meaningful, personalized messages
Share additional photos once you build trust
Schedule phone or video calls to get to know each other better

profileOptimization.title: Profile Optimization
tips: Use high-quality, well-lit photos that clearly show your face
Include a variety of photos: portrait, full-body, and casual shots
Write a detailed bio that showcases your personality and values
Be honest about your preferences and expectations
Keep your profile updated with recent information

communicationTips.title: Communication Tips
tips: Read their full profile before sending a message
Ask thoughtful questions about their interests and goals
Share genuine stories and experiences about yourself
Be respectful and patient in your conversations
Move to phone calls when both parties feel comfortable

makeProfileStandOut.question: How do I make my profile stand out?
makeProfileStandOut.answer: Use high-quality photos, write a compelling bio that shows your personality, be specific about your interests and values, and keep your information current and authentic.

firstMessage.question: What should I include in my first message?
firstMessage.answer: Reference something specific from their profile, introduce yourself briefly, ask a thoughtful question, and keep it genuine and respectful. Avoid generic messages.

personalInfoSafe.question: Is my personal information safe?
personalInfoSafe.answer: Yes, we use advanced security measures to protect your data. Your contact information is only shared when you choose to share it, and all profiles are verified before going live.

findMatchTime.question: How long does it typically take to find a match?
findMatchTime.answer: The timeline varies for everyone. Some find meaningful connections within weeks, while others may take several months. Success often depends on your activity level, openness, and profile quality.

hideProfile.question: Can I hide my profile temporarily?
hideProfile.answer: Yes, you can temporarily deactivate your profile from your account settings. Your profile will be hidden from searches, but your account and data remain safe.

organization.title: Organization
practices: Keep your profile organized with clear sections and updated information
Use descriptive and honest language throughout your profile
Organize your photos in a logical order (main photo first)
Regularly review and update your preferences

collaboration.title: Collaboration
practices: Involve family members in your search process when appropriate
Communicate openly about expectations and deal-breakers
Set up regular check-ins with potential matches
Be responsive and maintain good communication flow
Respect boundaries and take things at a comfortable pace

contactSupport.title: Need More Help?
contactSupport.description: Our support team is here to help you succeed in finding your perfect match. Whether you need technical assistance or advice on your matrimonial journey, we're just a message away.
